attributes.action: Make the State Pension annual increase the same for all pensioners.
attributes.additional_details: Inflation affects everyone, irrespective of their income.  But it’s those on the lowest level who feel it most.  We all pay the same price for a loaf of bread!
attributes.background: Whatever the percentage increase is each year, that is what all those on State Pension should receive, whether it’s the old or new one.  Thus, maintaining the same gap between the two!

rejection.details: The basic State Pension and new State Pension are increased by the same percentage. State pensions were increased by 10.1% in April 2023. You can find out more about the uprating of benefits and state pensions here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-9680/
